about_the_game:
Marking another banger of a soundtrack for Matt "NorrinRadd" Creamer, Slayin 2 fuses metal and fantasy like no other. Almost 3 years in the making, Matt has blended wailing guitars, power synth chords, retro motifs and his special sauce to produce an amazing aural experience.
  • 36 tracks total
  • 4 bonus tracks featuring unreleased material.
  • Composed by Matt "Norrin_Radd" Creamer (Shakedown Hawaii, Retro City Rampage, Treasure Buster).
